text:
@WhiteHouse You are out of your damn mind.

I thought @PressSec said she wasn't going to lie.

We know @KellyannePolls already uses alternative facts.

I can't wait until "you people" are gone.

#GOJOEBIDEN 

https://t.co/Bsx85ASBxr
